bug.short_desc: Scroll-Wheel support still seems to going crazy in ScrollContainer

long_desc.thetext:
When opening the API viewer with the the tree on the left side and a longer API documentation on the right, the behavior of the native scrollbar is different from the virtual one regarding mouse wheel support. In the virtual there seems to be some kind of page-forward while in the native one it just skips about 10 lines or something like this.
Tested under Windows XP with Google Chrome. This seems to be OK under Firefox 3.0
Link to test: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/apiviewer/#qx.bom.Collection
Added as major as this is quite annoying.
*** Bug 2070 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
The scroll speed on native elements can not be controlled. See attachment.
Created attachment 482 Demo for native scrolling
Native is no problem in my opinion. In the API Viewer the right hand pane is OK, but the tree on the left is damn fast in Chrome.
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
